TunableEnum.description: The event that we want to trigger this instance of the tuned test on. Joined - When a sim joins a dynasty Founded - When a sim starts a dynasty Left - When a sim leaves a dynasty KickedOut - When a sim is kicked out of a dynasty BecomeBlackSheep - When a sim becomes black sheep in a dynasty LostBlackSheepStatus - When a sim looses black sheep status a dynasty BecomeHead - When a sim becomes head of a dynasty StoppedBeingHead - When a dynasty looses its head BecomeHeir - When a sim becomes heir to a dynasty StoppedBeingHeir - When a sim stops being heir to a dynasty
